description:
Thanks for porting this to arm
as well! on Pinephone Manjaro Plasma 
beta 6, caprine launches and I can click things
but the keyboard never pulls up to start typing. 
more likely and issue with the os than caprine,
but figured it's worth mentioning.

This is a really nice app, but for some reason, some elements are being cut off at the bottom of the window, and resizing does not fix it, here is a screenshot to see what I am reffering to: https://imgur.com/a/jsypMUd
Messenger is update wrong time. When I just typing the messing, it shows 11 hours ago.

I really appreciate finally having a decent Messenger app for Linux, but the problems with uploading pictures, videos, and files is a real bum, I hope it gets fixed one day

Still, pretty solid
Not sure why, but my system tray icon shows up as dots, would be nice if it could show up as the chat bubble or something.
summary: Great App, System Tray Icon is Dots?

description: I must say that this app is amazing, even emoji style and dark theme are available! This helped me a lots, thanks!
At least good one.
summary: 2.55.0 version update disappear icon for launcher

description: Would recommend it!
I missed having a seperate app for Faebook! This app perfectly replaces the app! I also love the dark theme for saving my eyes.
It's okay, but don't want to use this anymore, because I'm not intrested in it. I've uninstalled this program, but it's trying to reinstall itself, and I fed up with this feature of this program.
summary: Not a great app, always trying to install itself. I fed up with it

description:
It's fine for writing messages, but it's an electron app (so heavy system resource usage and no integration with GNOME/KDE desktops) and it froze when my sibling sent me a message.

Just stick with the browser version or a webapp until this application improves
summary: Electron app that locked up when I recieved a message

description: Gave it a try and loved it. It even has a dark theme!
Works on Steam Deck

all the messages from myself are white text on god aweful yellow no matter the theme, it's objectively terrible on the eyes. I'd rather take the inconvenience of pulling out my phone or pulling up my browser then trying to read my own messages. Otherwise it works well and is a good program, but the color makes it practically unusable for me.
Doesnt sync with dark mode like it did in Fedora 38. now the whole window is white even when dark mode is on in the app.

positives:
 works great and provides a much needed chat for work

negatives:
 sayed I have some critical defence issues, when I logged in and never let me see what those issues are
  decided to uninstall and then install it a new - now I cant install it at all
On Nubara I cant share screen, share linked reels etc. from one conversation to another, Messenger settings won't pop-up

I like this app! I really like that it has dark mode and that u can get a non official desktop Messenger app without using the web app that it only has light mode. But, even after updating Caprine to the latest version, I still have problems opening preferences. Every time I click the "prefrences" button it doesn't show up anything. Please fix this problem for me and after that this review will turn to 5 stars. 
Thank you.
summary: A great non-official messenger desktop app for Linux users

description: this is really good for a messenger client for steam deck. it's pretty. there did seem to be a few buttons that did literally nothing and I think it's also a client for another app simultaneously besides fb messenger, but it's not in the way at all. Nonetheless app works great lmao
Works well but randomly logs out
it stopped working
